(4) Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 9,043 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 2.7 million Fire damage to your primary target and 220,934 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
